title: The Grand design
creator_credit: United Nations. Dept. of Public Information
brief_description: Shows the beginnings of the United Nations Organization, its political work for peace, and its achievements and aims in the fields of agriculture, health, and famine control Perhaps most inspiring are the sections dealing with economic aid and health projects which show how wide is the UN’s scope and effectiveness it these fields.
